about_the_game:
Step into a world where rhythm meets precision in this adrenaline-pumping VR game. Pulsar is an electrifying fusion of music, lasers, and moving targets that promises an immersive gaming experience like no other.

Check out my other game Snowpult!:

About the Pulsar:



Gameplay that Dances to Your Beat:

Prepare to be enthralled as you take center stage in this high-octane virtual reality extravaganza. Your mission? To shoot down moving targets with laser precision while grooving to the music of your choice. The game syncs seamlessly with your desktop music library, allowing you to set the perfect soundtrack to your action-packed adventure. Feel the rhythm pulse through your veins as you lock onto targets and let loose with your laser blasters.

Features:


BYOM: Bring Your Own Music, using the built in file browser select your favourite music and the game will analyze the waveform of the track and procedurally generates the beats in line with the music., No mods needed, no concerns about music licences expiring in the future.
detailed_description:
Step into a world where rhythm meets precision in this adrenaline-pumping VR game. Pulsar is an electrifying fusion of music, lasers, and moving targets that promises an immersive gaming experience like no other.

Check out my other game Snowpult!:

About the Pulsar:



Gameplay that Dances to Your Beat:

Prepare to be enthralled as you take center stage in this high-octane virtual reality extravaganza. Your mission? To shoot down moving targets with laser precision while grooving to the music of your choice. The game syncs seamlessly with your desktop music library, allowing you to set the perfect soundtrack to your action-packed adventure. Feel the rhythm pulse through your veins as you lock onto targets and let loose with your laser blasters.

Features:


BYOM: Bring Your Own Music, using the built in file browser select your favourite music and the game will analyze the waveform of the track and procedurally generates the beats in line with the music., No mods needed, no concerns about music licences expiring in the future.

name: Pulsar Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1700X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 8GB
  • VR Support: Oculus Rift, Oculus Quest, HTC Vive, Valve Index
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070, AMD Radeon 5700XT or better
  • VR Support: Oculus Rift, Oculus Quest, HTC Vive, Valve Index

short_description: Pulsar is a VR shooter that combines procedural generation with your music. Built in audio analysis will challenge your reflexes and accuracy with dynamic game play and visual effects. Key Features: in-game file browser and audio analysis 10 different worlds 2 game modes Weapon customization
